  • Pic-a-Pass

    view on GitHub

    Pic-a-Pass is a desktop password manager written in Python. The GUI was created using PyQT.

  • Rustbucket

    view on GitHub

    Rustbucket provides friends with a tool suite to prank each other. These tools include a tool that hides files, a tool that moves the mouse, a tool that changes the text in the clipboard, and many more tools.
